places_to_visit.name: Seminyak Beach
places_to_visit.description: Seminyak Beach is known for its upscale resorts and vibrant nightlife. It’s perfect for sunbathing, surfing, and enjoying beachside restaurants and bars.

places_to_visit.name: Uluwatu Temple
places_to_visit.description: Uluwatu Temple is a stunning cliffside temple offering panoramic views of the Indian Ocean. It’s a cultural and spiritual site with traditional Kecak dance performances.

places_to_visit.name: Ubud Monkey Forest
places_to_visit.description: The Ubud Monkey Forest is a nature reserve and Hindu temple complex where visitors can observe playful monkeys and explore ancient temples surrounded by lush greenery.

places_to_visit.name: Tegallalang Rice Terraces
places_to_visit.description: The Tegallalang Rice Terraces offer picturesque views of traditional Balinese rice paddies. It’s a great spot for photography and experiencing local agriculture.

places_to_visit.name: Nusa Dua Beach
places_to_visit.description: Nusa Dua Beach is known for its clear waters, white sand, and luxury resorts. It’s ideal for swimming, sunbathing, and enjoying water sports.
